name: 金仕淳
objective:
本課程簡述醫院常用的儀器其背後的物理原理及整合應用。讓學生為未來進入醫材領域預備足夠的背景知識，將本系所學生將所學之光電領域能力，進一步擴展至生醫光電的應用進行跨領域的學習。
內容提及電腦斷層、磁振造影、超音波、核子醫學、內視鏡等原理。
This course briefly introduces the physical principles behind the instruments commonly used in hospitals and their integrated applications. To allow students to prepare enough background knowledge for entering the field of medical materials in the future, and to further extend the optoelectronic capabilities that students in this department have learned to the application of biomedical optoelectronics for cross-field learning. The content mentions the principles of computed tomography, magnetic resonance imaging, ultrasound, nuclear medicine, endoscopy, etc.
schedule:
Week 1	Biomedical image modality - overview 
Week 2	Basic medical image physics
Week 3	X-ray principle - From Light to the dark
Week 4	From 2D to 3D: The tomographic principle
Week 5	Computed tomography 1: CT
Week 6	Computed tomography 2: Tomosynthesis
Week 7	Nuclear Medicine 1: SPECT
Week 8	Nuclear Medicine 2: PET
Week 9	Midterm
Week 10	Ultrasound
Week 11	Photo-acoustic Tomography
Week 12	MRI
Week 13	Optical imaging: Biomedical Fluorescence luminescence imaging
Week 14	The microscope
Week 15	Optical coherence tomography
Week 16	Endoscope
Week 17	Optical tomography
Week 18	Final Exam
materials:
Fundamentals of medical imaging (2nd ed) (by Paul Suetens)
Radiologic Science for Technologists - Physics, Biology, and Protection,  10th ed 
Physics in Nuclear Medicine (4th)
Customized Slide for image instrument
